Name: NEXT DOOR - An Eternal World
About the game: The girl who lost her memory wandered into a truly strange world. Animals wore clothes, walked on two legs, and talked with humans as a matter of course. The scientist who summoned her named Eva, had a specific purpose in mind. An anti-human movement on the rise brought Eva last hope, the legend of the 'outsider'. In the strange world inhabited by a wide variety of peoples who believe in various forms of the one and only God, the wheels of fate begin to spin around the girl who is from another world. -Genres Full-length RPG, Fantasy, Isekai -Estimated time to clear About 15 hours and more(Two Endings)
